works.complaint:
Hi, I would like to point out a number of incorrect,  

inappropriate and point blank lies on some of the reviews on our
restaurant.

1) We do not charge extra to pay for electricity. We have an optional 1%  

contribution to buy carbon credits to offset the carbon footprint. Works  

out to be about 18 cents a meal! It is optional but most care enough to  
contribute. This is therefore an incorrect statement and lie. Our staff
are  
fully trained and would not say this.
2) There is no way someone had to wait that long. We pride ourselves on  
quality and service. A lie and probably a competitor knocking us because
we  
are successful. We are busy because we deliver a great healthy product at 

prices no more than Boston Pizza! Sure you can get a slice of dominos for 

less but the quality is not the same!

These kinds of reviews are hurtful and very harmful. Our nation is  
supported by small independently operated businesses an this industry is  

incredibly tough at the best of times. Reviews like this can and do put  
businesses out of business.

I would also challenge that having it attached to our web site is
unethical  
as its the first thing people read. Please remove as soon as possible.

My wife is actually in tears about this. Really not fair.
